Two things I can think may be causing the problem. Either you are setting up the manoeuvre to go the wrong way, or the point on the ship you are controlling from is facing the wrong way.
Either the command pod is not facing the same way the ship is facing, or the engine is shut down.
I wager Scarecrow and blizzy are correct; let's see your craft to verify that's what's happening. Can you provide us with a couple of screenshots?
